ISSUE.TITLE: Add support for HCD 1.2
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The HCD agent currently is currently compiled against Converged Core 4 (CC4). However, HCD 1.2 is based on Converged Core 5. It is very likely that the current HCD agent will not work in HCD 1.2 or any HCD version based on CC5. The fix for this is likely to create yet another agent sub-module for HCD 1.2 and change the CC version in the [pom](https://github.com/k8ssandra/management-api-for-apache-cassandra/blob/master/management-api-agent-hcd/pom.xml#L75) ┆Issue is synchronized with this [Jira Story](https://datastax.jira.com/browse/MAPI-85) by [Unito](https://www.unito.io) ┆Issue Number: MAPI-85
